title: Sautiition's Hope
description: Waking from a six-year stasis, Captain Kari Hanley - along with her Lieutenant Jeff Mooney - is ready to complete her mission; to find a possible inhabitable planet deeper in our solar system.When they find themselves suddenly space-napped into a new mission, Captain Hanley will have to fight to make this mission a success. However, when things immediately start to take strange turns, not only do they struggle to help their new friends; but love and friendship, along with life-changing decisions and danger begin to pop up around every corner.Will she succeed in saving her kidnapperâ€™s race? Will she let love invade her soul, causing her to set her mission aside?Or will she manage to complete her mission and make it back home?Does she even want to?Follow Kari in her journey Among the Cosmos.*Sautiition's Hope is a slow burn Alien Romance with lots of adventure and struggle. There are difficult topics discussed, as well as tough situations and sexual scenes that make this book suitable for audiences 18+.
author: Melissa           Smith
